ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: i m speechless.  i ve never had an opinion of FoH (heard of them but big deal it s another server i ve never logged on) until now. sounds like these guys are
ygData.messageBody:
i'm speechless. i've never had an opinion of FoH (heard of them but big
deal it's another server i've never logged on) until now.

sounds like these guys are ruining the experience for a massive amount of
people. i hope they get systematically banned if they're still doing this.

(true, individuals and actions speak louder than mob rule, but silently
wearing a guild tag that condones this action is as good as holding the
victims down for the mugging)

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2000 10:48 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)

<snip>
I've seen them come in and KS
Nagafen when another guild was still fighting him. With the excuse that "He
would have killed you anyway" and absolutely no remorse or apology for
KS'ing the dragon, taking all the loot and calling the other guild a bunch
of losers among other things.
<snip>
